explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of deep neural networks (DNNs) in portfolio management, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions that risk-sensitive agents (RSAs) use unsupervised learning to assess parameter uncertainty without labeled data.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper states that RSAs are trained via reinforcement learning from dynamic trading simulations to estimate the distribution of reward.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions deep neural networks (DNNs) as a key component of the proposed framework.
explanations.deep learning: The paper focuses on the application of deep neural networks (DNNs), which are a core technology in deep learning.
